snippet: Wrote basic Python scripts to automate the process of organizing files.
Completed the 'Python for Everybody' specialization on Coursera, covering data structures and web scraping.
Followed a tutorial to build a simple Flask web application for a personal project.
Used Python with the Pandas library for a university data analysis assignment.
Developed a REST API backend for a web application using Python and Django, handling over 1,000 requests per minute.
Implemented a CI/CD pipeline using Jenkins and Docker to automate testing and deployment of a Python microservice.
Built and maintained a data processing pipeline with Python and Apache Airflow to handle daily ETL jobs.
Contributed to an open-source Python library, focusing on writing unit tests and improving documentation.
Architected and led the development of a scalable, distributed system using Python, gRPC, and Kubernetes.
Optimized a high-frequency trading algorithm in Python, reducing latency by 30% using multiprocessing and Cython.
Designed and implemented a machine learning model deployment strategy for Python-based services on AWS SageMaker.
Mentored junior developers on Python best practices, code reviews, and system design principles.
Learned React basics through the official documentation and built a simple to-do list application.
Completed a Udemy course on modern React with Hooks and Context API.
Built a personal portfolio website using React and CSS to showcase projects.
Developed and maintained user-facing features for a customer dashboard using React, Redux for state management, and TypeScript.
Collaborated with UX/UI designers to translate wireframes into high-quality, reusable React components.
Wrote unit and integration tests for React components using Jest and React Testing Library, achieving 95% test coverage.
Led the migration of a legacy jQuery application to a modern React/Next.js stack, improving performance and developer experience.
Designed and implemented a component library in React that was adopted by three other teams, ensuring brand consistency.
Optimized the performance of a large-scale React application by implementing code-splitting and memoization, improving the Lighthouse score by 40 points.
Architected the front-end of a complex single-page application (SPA) using React, GraphQL, and Apollo Client.
Deployed a simple static website to Amazon S3 and distributed it globally with CloudFront.
Completed the AWS Cloud Practitioner Essentials course and obtained the certification.
Launched and configured a basic EC2 instance to host a personal blog.
Developed and deployed a serverless application using AWS Lambda, API Gateway, and DynamoDB, reducing operational costs by 70%.
Managed EC2 instances, security groups, and IAM roles for a production application environment on AWS.
Configured a VPC with public and private subnets for enhanced network security.
Architected a highly available and fault-tolerant infrastructure on AWS using multiple Availability Zones, Auto Scaling Groups, and an Elastic Load Balancer.
Designed and implemented a CI/CD pipeline on AWS using CodePipeline, CodeBuild, and CodeDeploy to automate deployments to ECS.
Implemented a disaster recovery plan on AWS, leveraging cross-region snapshots and replication.
Wrote basic SQL queries (SELECT, WHERE, JOIN) to retrieve data from a MySQL database for a university project.
Completed an online course on SQL fundamentals, covering data definition (DDL) and manipulation (DML).
Used SQL to perform simple data lookups to support the customer service team.
Developed complex SQL queries with subqueries, CTEs, and window functions to generate business intelligence reports from a PostgreSQL database.
Designed and normalized a relational database schema for a new application feature, ensuring data integrity.
Wrote and maintained stored procedures and triggers to automate database tasks.
Optimized slow-running SQL queries by analyzing execution plans, adding indexes, and refactoring logic, improving database query performance by over 200%.
Designed and implemented a data warehousing strategy using SQL, including ETL processes for ingesting data from multiple sources.
Managed database migrations and schema changes in a production environment with zero downtime.
Containerized a simple Python Flask application using a Dockerfile for consistent development environments.
Completed the Docker Curriculum tutorial to learn about images, containers, and volumes.
Used Docker Hub to pull and run public images like Nginx and Redis.
Developed a multi-container application environment using Docker Compose for local development and testing of a microservices app.
Integrated Docker into a CI/CD pipeline to build and push images to a private registry like Amazon ECR or Docker Hub.
Wrote Dockerfiles for both development and production environments, managing different dependencies and configurations.
Optimized Docker images for production, reducing image size by 70% using multi-stage builds and minimizing layers.
Designed and managed a container orchestration strategy using Docker Swarm for a small-scale production environment.
Implemented a logging and monitoring solution for Docker containers using the ELK stack.
